summary: Joey and Sissel are two misfits spending most of their time together talking or having sex. Gradually and slowly their relationships are becoming boring for them.
cast: Natasha Gregson Wagner|Giovanni Ribisi|Robert John Burke|Jeannetta Arnette|Donal Logue|Eli Marienthal|Hugh Joseph Babin|Earl S. Binnings|Howard Barker|Trang Thanh Le|L. Christian Mixon|Jimmy McBride
title: First Love, Last Rites
